recommended_degree: Teknik Komputer Dan Jaringan, Sistem dan Teknologi Informasi, Ilmu Komputer (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
Description :
1. Perform on-site inspections, equipment checks, and routine maintenance.
2. Coordinate with internal teams and vendors to resolve operational issues promptly
3. Ensure compliance with safety, quality, and operational standards in the field.
4. Collect and report operational data, incidents, and performance updates
5. Provide hands-on assistance during deployments, installations, or field projects.

Requirement :
1. Basic understanding of field operations, equipment handling, or technical support processes.
2. Ability to perform on-site tasks, follow standard procedures, and work in a fast-paced operational environment.
3. Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.
4. Effective communication and collaboration skills.
5. Ability to learn quickly and adapt to new technologies.
6. Ability to work effectively in a team.
